original_title: Nina Hartley's Guide To Making Love To Men

Nina gives step-by-step instructions that will have you surprising and satisfying him for years to come! Discover the sure-fire way to increase his pleasure - and yours- with the expert advice of the sensuous Nina Hartley!
tagline: The key to pleasing yourself is pleasing your man!
title: Nina Hartley's Guide To Making Love To Men
